About Finding & Collecting | About Connecting

About Contributing


Tutorial: Contributing Basics
Contributing on Curriki

  • Publish your best curricula for the world to see and use.

    #if($context.user=="XWiki.XWikiGuest") » Add a Resource #else  » Add a Resource #end

  • Use materials in the Curriki repository to build your own curricula.

    » View a Sample Curriculum Collection

  • Get expert feedback on resources you contribute.

    » Curriki Review System


How to Contribute

#if($context.user=="XWiki.XWikiGuest") Login or become a member to add or create curriculum on Curriki. #else Go to: My Contributions |  My Collections #end


Add Your Best Curriculum

If you have teaching and learning resources that you’d like to share with the global education community, add them into the Curriki repository.

#if($context.user=="XWiki.XWikiGuest") » Add a Resource #else  » Add a Resource #end
 » View Featured Resources

Create a Resource

No wiki knowledge required! It’s easy to create instructional materials on Curriki: use a form to enter and format your content.

 » Make a Resource from "Scratch"
 » Make a Resource from a Template

TIPS ON CONTRIBUTING CONTENT

  • You can also contribute by adding materials to an existing curriculum collection: look for the "Build Up" link.

  • Visit the section About Learning Resources in the Curriki Help Collection to learn more about content in the Curriki repository.
